# signalEvent(_:value:)

**Instance Method**

Schedules an operation to signal a GPU event with a specific value after all GPU work prior to this point is complete.

## Declaration

```swift
func signalEvent(_ event: any MTLEvent, value: UInt64)
```

## Parameters

- **event**: [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLEvent] to signal.
- **value**: The value to signal the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLEvent] with.
